alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Gilchrist, western Bradford, western Alachua, western Union and southern Columbia Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 656 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Columbia to near Archer. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Columbia, Alachua, High Springs, Archer, Worthington Springs, Palestine Community, University Of Florida and Groves. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua
